entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this evening then changing to a few rain showers or flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
